TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 可能會發生事件只有當您呼叫方法。The event can occur only when you call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用事件列印未知的 XML 節點呼叫時所發生的各種屬性類別的方法。The following example uses the event of the to print various properties of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得未知 XML 節點的行號。

span.span: Gets the line number of the unknown XML node.

value.span: 未知 XML 節點的行號。

span.span: The line number of the unknown XML node.

public: property int LinePosition { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得未知 XML 節點在行中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position in the line of the unknown XML node.

value.span: 未知 XML 節點的位置編號。

span.span: The position number of the unknown XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string LocalName { get; }
.property instance string LocalName
Public ReadOnly Property LocalName As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要還原序列化的 XML 節點的 XML 區域名稱。

span.span: Gets the XML local name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 要進行還原序列化的節點的 XML 本機名稱。

span.span: The XML local name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回 XML 限定名稱的本機名稱 （也就是本機的一部分）。The property returns the local name (also known as a local part) of an XML qualified name. 屬性符合 1999年http://www.w3.org規格`Namespaces in XML`。The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. ## Examples 下列範例會列印未知的 XML 節點呼叫時所發生的類別的方法。The following example prints the of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.property instance string Name
Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 要進行還原序列化的節點名稱。

span.span: The name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會列印造成 [不明] 節點的名稱發生的事件。The following example prints the name of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public ReadOnly Property NamespaceURI As String
public: property System::String ^ NamespaceURI { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 與要進行還原序列化的 XML 節點相關的命名空間 URI。

span.span: The namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會列印造成未知 XML 節點的 URI發生的事件。The following example prints the URI of the unknown XML node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.XmlNodeType NodeType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeType NodeType
Public ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 取得要還原序列化的 XML 節點類型。

span.span: Gets the type of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: ，表示要進行還原序列化的 XML 節點。

span.span: The that represents the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉型別傳回要還原序列化之節點的描述。The enumeration returns a description of the node being deserialized. 例如，它會傳回 「 註解 」 如果節點是註解。For example, it returns "Comment" if the node is a comment. ## Examples 下列範例會造成 [不明] 節點的描述列印發生的事件。The following example prints a description of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public ReadOnly Property ObjectBeingDeserialized As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ObjectBeingDeserialized { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要還原序列化的物件。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會列印所傳回的值方法時方法遇到未知的 XML 節點。The following example prints the value returned by the method when the method encounters an unknown XML node.
